operations.description: Check if tasks.md exists in spec-020

operations.command: cd /media/sam/1TB/nautilus_dev/specs && for spec in 006-alpha-evolve-core 007-alpha-evolve-evaluator 008-alpha-evolve-templates 009-alpha-evolve-controller 010-alpha-evolve-dashboard 020-walk-forward-validation 031-csrc-correlation; do echo "=== $spec ===" && grep -A3 "^### FE-" "$spec/spec.md" 2>/dev/null | head -40; done
operations.description: Extract FE sections from all specs
Find all spec files with FE sections

operations.command:
python3 << 'PYEOF'
import re
from pathlib import Path

specs = [
    "006-alpha-evolve-core",
    "007-alpha-evolve-evaluator", 
    "008-alpha-evolve-templates",
    "009-alpha-evolve-controller",
    "010-alpha-evolve-dashboard",
    "020-walk-forward-validation",
    "031-csrc-correlation"
]

results = []

for spec in specs:
    spec_file = Path(f"/media/sam/1TB/nautilus_dev/specs/{spec}/spec.md")
    if spec_file.exists():
        content = spec_file.read_text()
        # Find all FE-XXX sections
        pattern = r'### (FE-\d{3}): (.+?)(?=\n\n|\n###|\Z)'
        matches = re.finditer(pattern, content, re.DOTALL)
        
        for match in matches:
            fe_id = match.group(1)
            title_line = match.group(2).split('\n')[0]
            # Extract trigger if present
            trigger_match = re.search(r'\*\*Trigger\*\*:(.+?)(?=\n\n|\*\*)', match.group(2), re.DOTALL)
            trigger = trigger_match.group(1).strip() if trigger_match else "See spec"
            trigger = trigger.replace('\n', ' ')[:80]  # First 80 chars
            
            results.append({
                'id': fe_id,
                'spec': spec.split('-')[0],
                'concept': title_line.strip(),
                'trigger': trigger,
                'status': 'documented'
            })

# Sort by ID
results.sort(key=lambda x: x['id'])

# Print markdown table
print("| ID | Spec | Concept | Trigger | Status |")
print("|----|------|---------|---------|--------|")
for r in results:
    print(f"| {r['id']} | {r['spec']} | {r['concept']} | {r['trigger']} | {r['status']} |")
PYEOF

python3 << 'PYEOF'
import re
from pathlib import Path

specs_triggers = {
    "020-walk-forward-validation": {
        "FE-001": "Rolling instability between windows",
        "FE-002": ">20 strategy variants tested",
        "FE-003": "5 windows insufficient for confidence",
        "FE-004": "Strategies pass WF but fail in live after N months"
    },
    "007-alpha-evolve-evaluator": {
        "FE-001": "Trade-offs between metrics (Sharpe vs Drawdown)",
        "FE-002": "Current single-period validation insufficient",
        "FE-003": "Traditional Sharpe assumes normality",
        "FE-004": "Zero-fee backtests unrealistic"
    },
    "006-alpha-evolve-core": {
        "FE-001": "Convergence to single solution",
        "FE-002": "Single population stagnation",
        "FE-003": "Fixed mutation rates suboptimal",
        "FE-004": "Old lineages dominating"
    },
    "008-alpha-evolve-templates": {
        "FE-001": "Single evolvable block limiting",
        "FE-002": "Complex multi-state strategies",
        "FE-003": "Hardcoded indicators",
        "FE-004": "Fixed position sizing"
    },
    "009-alpha-evolve-controller": {
        "FE-001": "Fixed mutation rates suboptimal",
        "FE-002": "Static prompts limiting exploration",
        "FE-003": "Single best strategy fragile",
        "FE-004": "Exploitation-only search"
    },
    "010-alpha-evolve-dashboard": {
        "FE-001": "Population convergence unclear",
        "FE-002": "Which mutations help?",
        "FE-003": "Where are we in search space?",
        "FE-004": "How did we get here?",
        "FE-005": "Is this overfitting?"
    },
    "031-csrc-correlation": {
        "FE-001": "Spearman assumes monotonic relationships",
        "FE-002": "Linear penalties (correlation^2) insufficient",
        "FE-003": "Joint extreme movements ignored"
    }
}

print("| ID | Spec | Concept | Trigger | Status |")
print("|----|------|---------|---------|--------|")

entries = [
    ("FE-001", "006", "Fitness Sharing (Niching)", specs_triggers["006-alpha-evolve-core"]["FE-001"]),
    ("FE-002", "006", "Island Model (Parallel Populations)", specs_triggers["006-alpha-evolve-core"]["FE-002"]),
    ("FE-003", "006", "Adaptive Mutation Rates", specs_triggers["006-alpha-evolve-core"]["FE-003"]),
    ("FE-004", "006", "Lineage Pruning (Age-Based Selection)", specs_triggers["006-alpha-evolve-core"]["FE-004"]),
    ("FE-001", "007", "Multi-Objective Optimization", specs_triggers["007-alpha-evolve-evaluator"]["FE-001"]),
    ("FE-002", "007", "Walk-Forward During Evolution", specs_triggers["007-alpha-evolve-evaluator"]["FE-002"]),
    ("FE-003", "007", "Probabilistic Sharpe Ratio", specs_triggers["007-alpha-evolve-evaluator"]["FE-003"]),
    ("FE-004", "007", "Transaction Cost Modeling", specs_triggers["007-alpha-evolve-evaluator"]["FE-004"]),
    ("FE-001", "008", "Multiple Evolvable Blocks", specs_triggers["008-alpha-evolve-templates"]["FE-001"]),
    ("FE-002", "008", "State Machine Templates", specs_triggers["008-alpha-evolve-templates"]["FE-002"]),
    ("FE-003", "008", "Feature Engineering Helpers", specs_triggers["008-alpha-evolve-templates"]["FE-003"]),
    ("FE-004", "008", "Risk-Aware Position Sizing", specs_triggers["008-alpha-evolve-templates"]["FE-004"]),
    ("FE-001", "009", "Adaptive Mutation Rate Control", specs_triggers["009-alpha-evolve-controller"]["FE-001"]),
    ("FE-002", "009", "Prompt Engineering Evolution", specs_triggers["009-alpha-evolve-controller"]["FE-002"]),
    ("FE-003", "009", "Ensemble Strategy Selection", specs_triggers["009-alpha-evolve-controller"]["FE-003"]),
    ("FE-004", "009", "Novelty Search", specs_triggers["009-alpha-evolve-controller"]["FE-004"]),
    ("FE-001", "010", "Population Diversity Heatmap", specs_triggers["010-alpha-evolve-dashboard"]["FE-001"]),
    ("FE-002", "010", "Mutation Success Attribution", specs_triggers["010-alpha-evolve-dashboard"]["FE-002"]),
    ("FE-003", "010", "Fitness Landscape Visualization", specs_triggers["010-alpha-evolve-dashboard"]["FE-003"]),
    ("FE-004", "010", "Lineage Tree Visualization", specs_triggers["010-alpha-evolve-dashboard"]["FE-004"]),
    ("FE-005", "010", "Overfitting Detection", specs_triggers["010-alpha-evolve-dashboard"]["FE-005"]),
    ("FE-001", "020", "Anchored vs Rolling Walk-Forward", specs_triggers["020-walk-forward-validation"]["FE-001"]),
    ("FE-002", "020", "White's Reality Check", specs_triggers["020-walk-forward-validation"]["FE-002"]),
    ("FE-003", "020", "Combinatorial Purged CV (CPCV)", specs_triggers["020-walk-forward-validation"]["FE-003"]),
    ("FE-004", "020", "Profit Factor Decay Analysis", specs_triggers["020-walk-forward-validation"]["FE-004"]),
    ("FE-001", "031", "Kendall Correlation (P2)", specs_triggers["031-csrc-correlation"]["FE-001"]),
    ("FE-002", "031", "Power-Law Penalty Scaling", specs_triggers["031-csrc-correlation"]["FE-002"]),
    ("FE-003", "031", "Tail Dependence (Copulas)", specs_triggers["031-csrc-correlation"]["FE-003"]),
]

for fe_id, spec, concept, trigger in entries:
    print(f"| {fe_id} | {spec} | {concept} | {trigger} | Documented |")
PYEOF

operations.command:
git add specs/FUTURE_ENHANCEMENTS.md specs/020-walk-forward-validation/spec.md specs/020-walk-forward-validation/tasks.md && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
docs: Add future enhancements index and link luck_skill.py

- Create comprehensive FUTURE_ENHANCEMENTS.md index:
  - 27 total enhancements tracked across 7 specs
  - Clear trigger conditions for each enhancement
  - Cross-references and implementation workflow
  - Prevents premature optimization via trigger-based activation

- Link luck_skill.py to spec-020 dependencies:
  - Orphaned DSR/PBO implementation now linked to walk-forward spec
  - Clarifies intended usage for statistical validation

- Add T-FE task to spec-020 tasks.md:
  - Future task to integrate LuckQuantifier for per-window DSR/PBO
  - References FE-002 (White's Reality Check)

Philosophy: Add complexity ONLY when triggered by observed problems.

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
git log --oneline -1 && echo "---" && git diff HEAD~1 --stat
